com.nestlabs.sdk

Interface NestListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    NestListener.AuthListener, NestListener.CameraListener, NestListener.DeviceListener, NestListener.GlobalListener, NestListener.MetadataListener, NestListener.SmokeCOAlarmListener, NestListener.StructureListener, NestListener.ThermostatListener

    public interface NestListener
    NestListener are listeners that receive events from the NestAPI and allow a user to complete actions when those events occur.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  NestListener.AuthListener
      Listens for updates to the status of authentication of NestAPI to the Nest service.
      static interface  NestListener.CameraListener
      Listens for updates to any Camera in a user's Nest account.
      static interface  NestListener.DeviceListener
      Listens for updates on all devices in a user's Nest account.
      static interface  NestListener.GlobalListener
      Listens for updates to any objects in a user's Nest account, including all devices, structures and metadata.
      static interface  NestListener.MetadataListener
      Listens for updates to the Metadata object in a user's Nest account.
      static interface  NestListener.SmokeCOAlarmListener
      Listens for updates to any SmokeCOAlarm in a user's Nest account.
      static interface  NestListener.StructureListener
      Listens for updates to any Structure in a user's Nest account.
      static interface  NestListener.ThermostatListener
      Listens for updates to any Thermostat in a user's Nest account.
